webshop.title: Webshop Optimization & Automation
webshop.description: Switching from WooCommerce to Next.js and full inventory synchronization, increasing conversion by 40%.
webshop.challenge: GreenLeaf Bio Ltd.'s old WooCommerce shop was slow, and stock often didn't match reality, leading to customer complaints. Manual order processing was time-consuming.
webshop.solution: We developed a modern, lightning-fast Next.js-based frontend while keeping WooCommerce as the backend. We introduced n8n-based automation for real-time stock sync and automated invoicing.
webshop.result: Page load speed dropped from 3 seconds to 0.8 seconds. Manual administration decreased by 80%, and conversion rate rose by 40% in the first 3 months.

patient.title: Secure Patient Management System
patient.description: GDPR-compliant, encrypted patient database and booking system on private cloud infrastructure.
patient.challenge: The praxis's paper-based records and phone bookings became unsustainable. Maximum protection of sensitive health data and GDPR compliance were top priorities.
patient.solution: We built a custom web app with an encrypted database running in a private cloud. We implemented 2FA and audit logging for all access.
patient.result: Reception workload decreased by 60% thanks to online booking. Data security is guaranteed, and the system complies with all current regulations.

server.title: High-Availability Server Cluster
server.description: 0-24 hour server park setup for tracking systems with 99.99% uptime.
server.challenge: Apex Logistics' tracking system often crashed under load, which was critical for freight. Outages caused significant financial loss.
server.solution: We built a multi-node Kubernetes cluster with autoscaling and HAProxy load balancer. We installed Prometheus and Grafana-based monitoring for proactive troubleshooting.
server.result: System availability reached 99.99%. During peak load, the system scales automatically, so there's no slowdown or downtime.

infrastructure.title: SMB Infrastructure Modernization
infrastructure.description: Transition from paper-based processes to secure private cloud with complete network infrastructure redesign.
infrastructure.challenge: TechVenture Ltd.'s 15-person team worked on outdated, local servers. Remote access was unreliable, data backups were manual, and network segmentation didn't exist. During COVID, home office became impossible.
infrastructure.solution: We built a Proxmox-based private cloud with WireGuard VPN for secure remote access. We segmented the network with VLANs (office, guest, servers). We introduced an automated 3-2-1 backup strategy and installed 24/7 monitoring (Zabbix).
infrastructure.result: The team can work securely from anywhere. Data loss risk dropped to zero, system availability is 99.9%. Monthly IT costs decreased by 30% while performance doubled.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.lead: BacklineIT Kft. is committed to protecting your personal data. This notice aims to provide clear and transparent information on how we handle your data in accordance with GDPR regulations.
Privacy.controller_desc: The controller of the data is BacklineIT (Headquarters: 2141 Cs칬m칬r, V칬r칬smarty utca 11., email: hello@backlineit.hu). Our company is responsible for the lawful, fair, and transparent processing of the personal data you provide.
Privacy.collected_desc: We may process the following data when using our services:

collected_list.contact: Contact Data: Name, email address, phone number (e.g., during contact or registration).
collected_list.billing: Billing Data: Billing name, address, tax number (in case of purchase).
collected_list.technical: Technical Data: IP address, browser type, device data (for secure website operation).
collected_list.cookies: Cookies: For improving user experience and statistical purposes. Detailed information in the Cookie Policy.

Privacy.cookies_desc: Our website uses cookies for proper operation, improving user experience, and statistical and marketing purposes.

cookies_list.session: Session Cookies: Essential for website navigation and functions.
cookies_list.stats: Statistical Cookies: Help understand how visitors use the website (e.g., Google Analytics). These data are anonymized.
cookies_list.marketing: Marketing Cookies: Used for displaying targeted advertisements.

Privacy.purpose_title: 3. Purpose and Legal Basis of Processing
Privacy.transfer_desc: We only transfer your data to third parties for service fulfillment or legal obligations. Our partners (processors):
Privacy.storage_desc: Personal data is stored only as long as the processing purpose is realized or required by law (e.g., accounting act). Billing data is kept for 8 years by law.
Privacy.rights_desc: Under GDPR, you are entitled to:

rights_list.access: Access: You can request information about your processed data.
rights_list.rectification: Rectification: You can request correction of inaccurate data.
rights_list.erasure: Erasure ('Right to be forgotten'): You can request deletion of your data if there is no other legal basis for processing.
rights_list.portability: Data Portability: You can request your data in a structured, machine-readable format.
rights_list.objection: Objection: You can object to processing based on legitimate interest.

Privacy.remedy_desc: You can lodge a complaint with the National Authority for Data Protection and Freedom of Information (NAIH) or turn to court.
Privacy.tools_desc: As a logged-in user, you can manage your account data here.

Terms.title: General Terms and Conditions
Terms.lead: Please read these General Terms and Conditions (GTC) carefully, as by using our website and services, you accept the terms described herein.

definitions_list.provider: Provider: BacklineIT, operating the website and providing services.
definitions_list.client: Client: Any natural or legal person using the Provider's services.
definitions_list.website: Website: The internet interface available under the backlineit.hu domain.
definitions_list.service: Service: Software development, consulting, and other IT services available through the website.

Terms.contract_desc_1: These GTC cover all electronic commerce services provided by the Provider. The contract is created by implied conduct (registration on the website, placing an order).
Terms.services_desc: The Provider offers services detailed on the website (e.g., web development, scripts, system administration). Exact content, pricing, and deadlines are in individual quotes or webshop product descriptions.
Terms.payment_desc: The Client can settle the fees via:

payment_list.card: Credit Card: Via SimplePay or Stripe system.
payment_list.transfer: Bank Transfer: Based on a pro forma invoice or invoice issued by the Provider.

Terms.withdrawal_desc: Clients qualifying as consumers are entitled to withdraw from the contract within 14 days without justification according to Gov. Decree 45/2014. (II. 26.).
Terms.withdrawal_digital_title: Loss of Withdrawal Right for Digital Content
Terms.withdrawal_digital_desc: ATTENTION: For digital content not supplied on a tangible medium (e.g. software, script downloads), the consumer loses their right of withdrawal if the Provider began performance with the consumer's express prior consent, and the consumer acknowledged losing their right of withdrawal.
Terms.warranty_legal_desc: In case of defective performance by the Provider, the Client can assert a legal warranty claim according to the Civil Code.
Terms.warranty_product_desc: In case of a defect in a movable item (product), the Client can assert a legal warranty or product warranty claim.
Terms.guarantee_desc: In case of defective performance, the Provider is obliged to provide a guarantee if required by law or voluntarily undertaken.
Terms.ip_desc: The entire content of the website constitutes the intellectual property of the Provider and is protected by copyright.
Terms.liability_desc: The Provider does its best for the smooth operation of the website but is not liable for damages resulting from internet network errors, technical outages, or force majeure events.
Terms.complaints_desc: The Client can report complaints regarding the service at hello@backlineit.hu.
Terms.closing_desc: Issues not regulated in these GTC are governed by Hungarian laws.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.desc: Everything you need to know about pricing and services

0.question: How long does the project take?
0.answer: Starter packages usually take 2-3 weeks, Professional 4-6 weeks, and Enterprise projects 8-12 weeks. The exact timeframe is determined by project complexity, discussed during the first consultation.

1.question: What payment options are available?
1.answer: We accept bank transfer, card payment, and installment plans. We ask for 50% of the project fee as a deposit, with the remaining 50% due upon handover. We also offer custom payment structures for Enterprise clients.

2.question: What does the support package include?
2.answer: The support package includes technical assistance, bug fixes, minor modifications, security updates, and monthly performance reports. Professional packages come with 6 months, Enterprise with 12 months support automatically.

3.question: Do I need my own domain and hosting?
3.answer: Not necessarily. The Starter package includes 1 year of shared hosting. If you have your own hosting, we can use that too. We also help with domain registration and hosting selection.

4.question: Can I upgrade the package later?
4.answer: Absolutely! You can upgrade services at any time. For example, if you start with a Starter package, you can add webshop functions, automations, or DevOps services later.

5.question: What happens if I'm not satisfied?
5.answer: Every project has an approval process. We continuously consult during design and development to ensure you get exactly what you imagined. If any issue arises, we solve it together.

6.question: What technologies do you use?
6.answer: We use modern, future-proof technologies: Next.js, React, Tailwind CSS, WordPress, WooCommerce, Node.js, Python, Docker, AWS/DigitalOcean. We always choose the most suitable stack for the project.

7.question: Do I get a GDPR-compliant solution?
7.answer: Yes, all our websites are GDPR-compliant. Cookie consent banner, privacy policy, data management notice are all included. Enterprise packages also come with a full GDPR audit.

FAQ.bottom_text: Can't find the answer to your question?

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.desc: Everything you need to know about the consultation

0.question: How long does the consultation take?
0.answer: The consultation takes about 30 minutes. This is enough time to understand your needs, discuss your projects, and answer your questions.

1.question: Is it really free?
1.answer: Yes, it is completely free and commits you to nothing. Our goal is to get to know each other and help you find the best solution for your needs.

2.question: What topics can we discuss?
2.answer: Anything IT-related: web development, automation, security audit, system administration, DevOps, custom scripts, integrations, etc.

3.question: Is it online or in-person?
3.answer: The consultation takes place online via Google Meet or Zoom, so you can join from anywhere.

4.question: What should I prepare?
4.answer: Nothing special! If you have a specific project or question, it's worth formulating it in advance, but we will lead the conversation and help you navigate.

5.question: When will I get feedback?
5.answer: We will contact you via email or phone within 24 hours of booking to agree on the exact time.

SysAdmin.tech_stack_desc: We work with the industry's best tools for maximum stability.
SysAdmin.use_cases_desc: Real examples of how we helped others.

use_cases_items.title: CI/CD Pipeline
use_cases_items.description: Automated testing and deployment on every code change.
use_cases_items.example: GitHub push -> Automatic test run -> Build -> Deploy to production server without downtime.

use_cases_items.title: Cloud Migration
use_cases_items.description: Moving traditional servers to modern cloud infrastructure.
use_cases_items.example: Moving old VPS to AWS, setting up auto-scaling to handle traffic spikes.

use_cases_items.title: Server Monitoring
use_cases_items.description: 24/7 supervision and immediate alerting in case of error.
use_cases_items.example: Monitoring CPU, RAM, Storage. SMS alert if response time increase or service stops.

use_cases_items.title: Data Backup
use_cases_items.description: Automated, encrypted backups to external locations.
use_cases_items.example: Daily database and file backup to S3, with 30-day retention. Monthly restore test.

use_cases_items.title: Load Balancing
use_cases_items.description: Traffic distribution between multiple servers for stability.
use_cases_items.example: Configuring Nginx load balancer for 3 web servers. If one fails, others take over.
use_cases_items.roi: No downtime even with high traffic

use_cases_items.title: Infrastructure as Code (IaC)

Scripts.title: Custom Scripts & Automation
Scripts.description: Automate boring, repetitive tasks. Save time and reduce manual errors with custom scripts and workflows.

hero_benefits.title: Time Savings
hero_benefits.description: Tasks that took hours now run automatically in seconds. Our clients save an average of 20-30 hours per month.

hero_benefits.title: Error-free Operation
hero_benefits.description: Automation doesn't get tired and doesn't make typos. 95% fewer human errors.

hero_benefits.title: Scalability
hero_benefits.description: Your systems will be able to handle growing traffic without human intervention.

Scripts.use_cases_title: What can you use it for?
Scripts.use_cases_desc: Real-world examples of how automation can help your business

use_cases_items.title: Email Automation
use_cases_items.description: Automatic email sending for events, reminders, or marketing campaigns.
use_cases_items.example: Automatic welcome email series upon new customer registration, followed by weekly newsletters with personalized content.

use_cases_items.title: Data Synchronization
use_cases_items.description: Automatic synchronization of data between different systems.
use_cases_items.example: Automatic transfer of WooCommerce orders to the billing system and CRM.

use_cases_items.title: Report Generation
use_cases_items.description: Automatic reports created and sent at specified intervals.
use_cases_items.example: Automatic generation of weekly sales reports in Excel with charts, sent via email.

use_cases_items.title: Calendar Integration
use_cases_items.description: Automatic appointment booking, reminders, and calendar synchronization.
use_cases_items.example: Automatic Google Calendar entry upon customer booking + SMS reminder 24 hours before.

use_cases_items.title: Website Monitoring
use_cases_items.description: Automatic tracking of website availability, performance, and changes.
use_cases_items.example: Hourly check if the webshop is available. Immediate SMS and email notification in case of downtime.

use_cases_items.title: Data Processing
use_cases_items.description: Automatic processing, cleaning, and transformation of large amounts of data.
use_cases_items.example: Daily update of 1000+ product prices and inventory based on supplier CSV, automatic upload to the webshop.

portfolio_items.title: E-commerce Automation

portfolio_items.title: Data Collection & Reporting

portfolio_items.title: Customer Support Automation
portfolio_items.content: Email received  automatic ticket creation  categorization with AI  assigned to the appropriate staff  automatic response to customer.

Security.title: Security & Audit
Security.description: Protect your business and your customers' data. Professional security auditing and protection for websites and servers.

hero_benefits.title: Peace of Mind
hero_benefits.description: Know that your systems are protected against the most common attacks.

hero_benefits.title: Trust
hero_benefits.description: Your customers trust a secure, audited website more.

hero_benefits.title: Savings
hero_benefits.description: Recovering from a successful attack costs much more than prevention.

Security.use_cases_desc: How we make your systems more secure

use_cases_items.title: Security Audit
use_cases_items.description: Scanning existing systems and identifying vulnerabilities.
use_cases_items.example: Checking website, server, and database settings. Detailed report on errors and suggested fixes.

use_cases_items.title: Penetration Testing (Pentest)
use_cases_items.description: Simulated attacks to find weak points in the system.
use_cases_items.example: Ethical hacker attack against the webshop, searching for SQL Injection, XSS, and other bugs.

use_cases_items.title: Server Hardening
use_cases_items.example: Closing unnecessary ports, SSH protection, Firewall configuration, Fail2Ban installation.

use_cases_items.title: GDPR Compliance
use_cases_items.description: Technical implementation of data protection regulations.
use_cases_items.example: Database encryption, logging setup, automated data deletion processes.

use_cases_items.title: Malware Removal
use_cases_items.example: Cleaning infected WordPress sites, searching for and closing backdoors.

use_cases_items.title: WAF Setup
use_cases_items.description: Building a Web Application Firewall defense line.
use_cases_items.example: Configuring Cloudflare or ModSecurity to filter malicious traffic.
use_cases_items.roi: Protection against DDoS and bot attacks

base.name: Basic Audit
base.desc: Check for smaller websites and blogs

detailed.name: Detailed Audit
detailed.desc: Audit for webshops and business sites

hero_benefits.title: Real-time Data

hero_benefits.title: Fewer Errors

scenarios.description: Real-time inventory updates across all sales channels. If you sell something in the store, the inventory updates on the webshop too.
